name: Treasure Bird
description:
This is a classic endless runner-styled game. It's a simple game, but I wanted to get some practice again since I haven't made games in a while. However, I've rediscovered my love for game development and want to work towards making more games. I am hoping that this will be the start of many more games to come!

Credit Where Credit Is Due

  • ChipTone by SFBGames (itch.io)
